text: Blue Velvet is a 1986 American mystery movie by David Lynch. It is set in North Carolina. The cast include Dennis Hopper, Laura Dern and Kyle MacLachlan. The title is from the 1963 Bobby Vinton song of the same name. This movie was originally detested by certain movie critics, although it is now widely acclaimed. It was controversial at the time of its 1986 release, and has since become a cult favorite. Lynch got his second Academy Award nomination for Best Director for the movie. == Other websites == * * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:1986 mystery movies Category:1986 thriller movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:BDSM in movies Category:Cult movies Category:Film noir Category:Movies about suburbia Category:Movies set in North Carolina Category:Movies directed by David Lynch Category:American independent movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Blue Velvet (movie)
